name: memoizerific
description: Fast, small, efficient JavaScript memoization lib to memoize JS functions
author: Baz <baz@thinkloop.com>

scripts.test: echo '****************'`date +%r`'********************' && npm run -s test:map && npm run -s test:similar
scripts.publish_to_npm: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.build:all: npm run -s build:browserify | tee memoizerific.js | npm run -s build:minify | tee memoizerific.min.js | npm run -s build:gzip > memoizerific.min.gzip.js
scripts.build:browserify: browserify src/memoizerific.js -t [envify purge] --node --detectGlobals false --standalone memoizerific | derequire
